00013 struct sfc_vertex {         /* BSFC vertex  */
00014   int destination_proc;
00015   int cut_bin_flag;  /* =BSFC_NO_CUT (0) if this object does not belong to
00016                         a bin with a cut in it
00017                         =BSFC_CUT (1) if this object belongs to a bin with
00018                         a cut in it */
00019   int next_sfc_vert_index; /* used for creating a linked list of vertices 
00020                               (linklist is fortran style) */
00021   unsigned sfc_key[KEYLENGTH];   /* space-filling curve key */
00022   unsigned my_bin;
00023   float lb_weight;
00024   //int count; // used to put the destination proc back into the element hashtable
00025   
00026 };
